name: 🚀 Safe Deploy
description: One-click safe deploy agent. Runs safeguard, auto-deploy, logs, and echoes final URL.
script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Import safeguard + deploy utils
source ./deploy_utils.sh

# Run deploy
railway up --service=synqra-os | tee deploy_output.log

# Extract URL (if available)
URL=$(grep -o 'https://[^ ]*railway.app' deploy_output.log | tail -n 1 || true)

if [ -n "$URL" ]; then
  echo -e "\n\033[1;33m🚀 FINAL DEPLOY URL: $URL\033[0m\n"
  log_deploy "synqra-os" "$URL"
else
  echo -e "\n❌ No URL found in logs. Check Railway dashboard.\n"
fi
